tool_description: Monitors and analyzes account activity patterns including login attempts, session duration, and user actions to identify suspicious behavior.

account_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer account

monitoring_duration_hours.description: Number of hours to monitor activity (1-168)

include_failed_attempts.description: Whether to include failed login attempts in monitoring

error_messages: Invalid account_id: Account ID must be a non-empty string and exist in the system.
Invalid monitoring_duration_hours: Duration must be between 1 and 168 hours.
Account access denied: Insufficient permissions to monitor this account.
usage: Provide account_id and optionally set monitoring_duration_hours and include_failed_attempts. Monitor continuously for the specified duration to capture activity patterns.

total_login_attempts.description: Total number of login attempts during monitoring period

activity_timestamps.description: Array of timestamp strings when activities occurred

suspicious_patterns.description: List of identified suspicious activity patterns
